definition: elite/outstanding talent/genius
(dialectal pronunciation of 俊[jun4])/cool/neat
smart/eminent/handsome/talented
hero/heroic/outstanding person/prominent/distinguished
Only an outstanding talent can recognize current trends (idiom). A wise man submits to circumstances.
pinyin: shi2 shi2 wu4 zhe3 wei4 jun4 jie2

sentences.english: My name is Liujunjie. She is Heyi. We are good friends.
sentences.chinese: 我是何怡，他是我的好朋友劉俊傑。

sentences.english: Those who let themselves be guided by the current course of events are real heroes.
Junjie caught horse standing in line to buy tickets in the supermarket of the PP.
sentences.chinese: 俊傑在超市裏撞見在排隊買馬票的PP。

sentences.english: You want to marry someone called Masumi.
sentences.chinese: 你會想嫁給一個名字叫做秋俊傑的。

sentences.english: Lam began to gain momentum for a game. It's "Heaven II"this time.
sentences.chinese: 俊傑也開始爲遊戲造勢了，這次是《天堂II》。

sentences.english: They tried to dress him up as a "national hero".
sentences.chinese: 他們想把他化裝一個”民族俊傑”。

sentences.english: The real hero of the match was our goalkeeper.
sentences.chinese: 這次競賽中真正的俊傑是替考的守門員。

sentences.english: If we take finding opportunity as foresight, then grasping opportunity is a person of outstanding talent.
sentences.chinese: 如果說發現機遇是識時務，而把握好機遇方爲俊傑。

sentences.english: Jun-jie hao to worry about the ability of the new fourth army, he is waiting for hydrostatic county of good news.
sentences.chinese: 郝俊傑擔心新四軍的能力，他在等靜水縣的好消息。

sentences.english: JJ is addicted to these gadgets.
sentences.chinese: 俊傑喜歡用這些小玩意。
